messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum number of magic points a crystal of the Elder Things can store?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many magic points can the smallest shard of a crystal of the Elder Things store?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a crystal of the Elder Things to be room temperature?
When it is empty.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a crystal of the Elder Things to become colder?
As more magic points are stored in it.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many rounds must a user spend attuning to a crystal of the Elder Things?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required for a user to draw upon magic points from the Crystal of the Elder Things?
A POW roll must be made with success.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is said to have the ability to invest crystals with further magic points?
Only elder things.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purported function of the Crystallizer of Dreams?
The ability to view places faraway (distant lands, planets, and perhaps dimensions) in dreams.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is said to be able to bring items (or creatures) back with the user from the Dreamlands, using the Crystallizer of Dreams?
Its user must have the item or creature in physical contact with them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is said to be a servant of Hypnos that appears to the user of the Crystallizer of Dreams?
A translucent jellyfish.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What has the ability and understanding to invest crystals with further magic points?
Elder things
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purported second function of the Crystallizer of Dreams?
The ability to bring items (or even creatures) back with the user from the Dreamlands
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the color of the Domination Serum?
Colorless
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is susceptible to the Domination Serum?
Serpent people
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much of the Domination Serum is required for full effect?
Ten drops
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the key to the sug-gessibility of the Mi-go?
Something in their peculiar smell or the specific intonation of their voices
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the serum take to metabolize in a victim?
1D10+10 days
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the Earthquake Mining Machine?
To pull a deeply buried stratum up through intervening layers of rock
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the distance the Earthquake Mining Machine can reach?
Four to five miles
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the side effect of using the Earthquake Mining Machine?
Causing earthquakes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be adjusted to pull a deeply buried stratum up through intervening layers of rock?
The machine
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How deep can the machine reach down?
Four to five miles
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the magnitude of the earthquake directly correlated to?
The size and depth of the area affected
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is used by the Mi-go to fire the Electric Gun?
The Electric Gun itself
